name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZenSlide - Safe Video Experience for Photosensitive and Epileptic Users

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your videos into calming slideshows. Perfect for those with photosensitivity or epilepsy. Reduce the risk of seizures. Free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience a new way to watch videos. With its smooth transitions, ZenSlide significantly reduces visual stimuli, providing a more serene environment for those with photosensitivity or epilepsy. Enjoy a calming and personalized visual experience, without the risk of triggering seizures.

Release Note:
Version 3: Open a new tab instead of a new window to avoid blink effect when a new window is created.

This extension is designed to improve user experience and is not intended for commercial use. The author assumes no responsibility for improper use or damage caused by this extension.
